meanings.definition: A shortened form of the word 'ravioli'.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat ravs for dinner.

meanings.sent2: The invaders decided to ravs the village for treasures.

meanings.definition: A slang term for ravenous or extremely hungry.
meanings.sent1: After the hike, I was so ravs that I ate two sandwiches.
